title: BSplayer Pro 2.62.1068 Final + Keys By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009	

World's most popular multimedia player! Ever since the very beginning in the year 2000, the BS.PlayerÃ¢â€žÂ¢ has been one of the world's most popular multimedia players. It is popular for many reasons, one however should be pointed out: BS.PlayerÃ¢â€žÂ¢ is the first player ever to enable its users to focus on watching the movie instead of dealing with poor computer capabilities or running around looking for a proper setting and codec.

BS.PlayerÃ¢â€žÂ¢ is a Windows Ã‚Â® player that plays back all kinds of all sort of media files ( avi / mpg / asf / wmv / wav / mp3...) and specialises in video and divx playback. It can also display subtitles. Also available are different skins for this player.


What does the BS.PlayerÃ¢â€žÂ¢ 2.0 Pro have to offer:

- Customizable Equalizer
- Support for Capture/Tuner devices
- Capture Video to file
- Integrated subtitle editor
- Network file buffering
- Improved subtitles
- Improved VMR9 support
- Technical email support
- DVD support (codecs required)
- Free one year subscription upgrade 



    Whats NeW!

    IMPROVED
    - online subtitles sorting
    FIXED
    - fixed freeze problem with audio streams
    - fixed problem with audio balance when loading EQ presets
    - workaround for LAV filters, they won't crash anymore
    - some other bug fixes
    ADDED
    - added support for YouTubeurl syntax



                                  By bobiras2009
